DOC.brief_summary: 10 patients with chronic heart failure receiving daptomycin therapy after implantation of a left ventricular heart assist system. Measurement of daptomycin levels in drainage fluids (mediastinal and pleural drainage systems) and in blood samples.
DOC.brief_title: Daptomycin Concentration in Drainage Fluid and Blood Samples of ICU Patients
